workflow.description: Migrates a virtual machine from one host to another by using MigrateVM_Task from the vSphere API.

param.name: pool
param.description: Destination resource pool for the virtual machine. If you do not set the resource pool parameter, the current resource pool is used as the destination pool

param.name: host
param.description: Destination host to which to migrate the virtual machine

param.name: state
param.description: (Optional) Only migrate the virtual machine if its power on state matches the specified state

attrib.name: progress
attrib.description: Log progress while waiting for the task

attrib.name: pollRate
attrib.description: Polling rate for the task state, in seconds

workflow-item.name: item0
item1
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.vmware.library.vc.basic").vim3WaitTaskEnd(task,progress,pollRate) ;

bind.name: progress
bind.description: Log progess while waiting for the task

bind.name: pollRate
bind.description: Polling rate for the task state [seconds]

workflow-item.description: Wait a VIM 3 Task to end. When task ended, return the

p-param.name: pool
p-param.desc: Destination resource pool for the virtual machine. Default is the current resource pool.

p-param.name: host
p-param.desc: Destination host to which to migrate the virtual machine

p-param.name: state
p-param.desc: (Optional) Only migrate the virtual machine if its power on state matches the specified state
